item.description:
This months meeting will be something a little different. We wil have two of our own CFIIs talk with us on an open forum of sorts.

Pete Coolidge CFII, will talk with us about some of the regular issues he runs into
during flight training and Issues during BFRs and everything in between. As well
as some refreshing How To's of flight maneuver. Pete is the king of Trim Flying.

We will then take a short break and we will have some Member Profile sheets
available.  Everyone has a few good stories. Left seat or right. Let's hear more
about our members. Ed Bruce's last story was incredible. Thanks Ed!

Be a part of this group by sharing, we really are interested!



After the break, Gary Rabidou CFII, will talk to us about basic IFR training. What they look for? How they train us, some basic flight training you can do on your
own to test your IFR ability. As well as where the issues seem to be during IPC's and more.

This will be a fun open forum meeting. So, please bring your questions and participate.

OSH Raffle Tickets will be on sale. They are actually selling better than ever! We are limiting the sales to 50 tickets maximum.

We'll pick up some discussions on our many upcoming events as well..

-----------------------------------------------

As always, food at 6:00 and meeting at 7:00.

Where else can you have this much excitement for $25 bucks a year?

Fly Often and Fly Safe,
Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association EAA Chapter 1454 Monthly Meetup
